title: Teachstone Experience
content: Lewis Meyers worked as AI Frontend/Tier 3 Engineer at Teachstone from June 2023 to Present. Designed and refined Figma and React/TypeScript UIs, improving reporting tool accessibility and UX, boosting company-wide adoption by 40%. Resolved 10-15 monthly Salesforce tickets and automated Java/SQL workflows, cutting turnaround time by 30% and enhancing AI tool efficiency by 25%.

title: Hyperlink AI Platform Engineer
content: Lewis worked as AI Platform Engineer at Hyperlink in SF Bay Area from Jan 2024 to May 2024. Raised $3.2M at SXSW 2024 through an SVP pitch, delivering the AI speech generator MVP on time with 50+ users engaging over 5 minutes each. Built TypeScript components and optimized Next.js APIs, boosting platform stability by 30%.

title: Dream Net AI Project
content: Built an AI dream interpreter using Next.js and ChatGPT, trained on specialized dream data with 25% improved accuracy during a 30-tester beta. Implemented Supabase for user authentication and backend services, ensuring real-time data management and secure access.

title: Soke2x Smoothie Shop
content: Designed a 3D ecommerce site with Three.js and Figma UI/UX, growing smoothie shop orders from 5-10 daily to 15-20. Integrated Node.js for optimized navigation and email APIs, cutting response times by 50% and doubling order volume in 12 months.

title: Frontend Technical Skills
content: Lewis has experience with JavaScript, TypeScript, Next.js, React, Bootstrap, HTML5/CSS3, TailwindCSS, MantineCSS. Also proficient with Git, GitHub, Docker, Jira, and Visual Studio Code.

title: Contact Information
content: Lewis Meyers can be contacted at meyerslewis193@gmail.com or through LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/lewiscmeyers. His portfolio website is lewismeyers.dev.
